name: Monkey Kingdom Game Final
description:
IOS Game

Target Age: Kids and Teens

ESRB: E

Game Summary: Bobo the monkey lives in a jungle kingdom which has been taken over by the evil king, Posier takes over the kingdom and wants to ruin its peace. Bobo(the player) must climb through the tallest trees going through many different obstacles and evil bees who defend Posier to get to him and take the kingdom back. Bobo must complete this before he ruins the jungle kingdom.

Game Outline: Bobo goes to the jungle and begins to climb up trees. In this game, the only game mechanic is jumping and moving left and right. He will use that to get up the trees. On each branch/platform he jumps on to, there will be various evil bees he must avoid  in order to pass through. If he falls off the trees or touches the bees too many times, he will die. There are about 12 different platforms he needs to pass, and 2 levels, the last one is where he will face the king. In order to go to the next level, the player must collect a star on the last platform of each level. Will Bobo be able to get to him before he destroys the kingdom?

USP:

  • 2 levels to complete.
  • Will you make it in time to save the kingdom?
  • Challenging obstacles and defenders on each level.
  • Fun characters.
  • Based in the jungle for a fun environment.
  • Great for all ages!

Similar Competitive Products:

Jump King and Super Mario
